meanings.definition: A person who follows the theory of constructivism.
meanings.sent1: The constructivists in the class enjoyed hands-on activities to learn better.
meanings.sent2: Many constructivists believe that learners construct their own understanding.
meanings.sent3: The constructivists decided to build a model city out of recycled materials for fun.
meanings.sent4: In the world of education, constructivists are like architects of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The group of constructivists worked together to create a new learning approach.

meanings.definition: Belonging to or relating to constructivism.
meanings.sent1: The teacher used a constructivists approach to engage the students in the lesson.
meanings.sent2: The constructivists principles emphasize active learning and critical thinking.
meanings.sent3: It was a constructivists challenge to design a sustainable building using only natural materials.
meanings.sent4: Her teaching style was as dynamic and ever-evolving as a constructivists philosophy.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was filled with a buzz of creativity, reflecting the constructivists influence.
